data.sec1Desc1: Syncrow is the refined outcome built on the synergy of aesthetics and cutting-edge technology. We have paved a path for merging creativity with technology and are delivering state-of-the-art automation solutions.
data.sec1Desc2: Our aim is to transform and improve the way people enjoy their everyday life. Making their daily tasks easier and adding more to their quality of life.
data.sec1Desc3: This lies at the root of how all of our solutions are shaped. By utilizing the latest tech innovations, we’ve created faster, better, and more convenient solutions that address the needs of global customers.
data.sec2Text: Our promise is to deliver scalable, customizable, and affordable solutions for an upgraded lifestyle or industry experience.
data.sec3Text2: Our solutions are evolution-oriented. By tapping into the most recent IoT technologies, we ensure that our solutions are creatively shaped to comply with the coming changes and are not a stop-gap solution to your needs.
data.sec3Text3: Innovation is in our blood. It is the energy that drives us to hit the mark with every new solution we craft. After every success, our thirst for innovation leads us back to the drawing table to create technologies that upgrade lifestyle and fit a variety of different industries.
data.sec3Text4: Our energies are directed towards making a variety of next-gen technology available today. While doing so, we also keep a firm eye on making it affordable. As an organization, we firmly believe that technology should work for our customers which allows them to live life without compromising on luxury.
data.sec3Text5: As a family, the passion and ambition to put our best foot forward, every time, is ingrained in us. We aim to provide all our customers with a happy and uniform experience while also providing the best solution for their needs. This is why we are one of the leaders in the IoT and Automation solutions industry.
data.sec3Text11: As an organization, we believe in pioneering the IoT to deliver boutique solutions that are tailored to your needs, personal or industry.
data.sec3Text12: Within our core values, we stay strong to delivering solutions which are:
data.sec4Text11: Interested in joining the Syncrow Family? Passionate about designing the future of smart technology?
data.sec4Text12: Apply for open positions. Send in your CV to careers@syncrow.ae
data.TeamSecdescri1: An analyst and problem solver at heart, Talal Debs is a Master of Chemical Engineering degree holder. Having been in the manufacturing field for most of his professional career, his core competencies include data collection and analysis.
data.TeamSecdescri2: Having previously worked on a similar project in his homeland alongside Mohamad, with massive success, Talal contacted him upon his move to Dubai and told him about his vision of opening up a company that provides IoT solutions. Talal realized that 92% of the units in Dubai, whether commercial, residential or public, were not automated and did not have the infrastructure to do so. In response, Talal decided he would create a solution that is customisable to any site and affordable to everyone, and will not stop until every existing unit in the UAE becomes automated, and Syncrow was born.
data.TeamSecdescri3: With a knack for seeing the bigger picture, Talal now oversees Syncrow's business development, marketing, and data analysis.
data.TeamSecdescri4: In addition to being the Chief Executive Officer at Syncrow, Talal has an extensive record collection and library of literature. Reading and writing are among his interests, and his favorite author is George Orwell. An avid traveler who considers himself an extrovert, Talal spends about 100 days traveling every year.
data.TeamSecdescri5: Mohammad Zakhour began his career as an Electrical Engineer and evolved into a highly experienced professional over 15 years, holding multiple management and operation roles in the construction and facility management industries. He has a fruitful career with a proven track record of success dealing and working with several recognised companies and projects.
data.TeamSecdescri6: Considered a super engineer by Talal, Mohammad is able to find unique solutions to otherwise insurmountable problems. He wanted to create a company which can provide unique solutions, with enhanced service and customer experience. Mohammad lent his methodical engineering skills to build an IoT solution. Hence, Syncrow came to be. Considering the project his baby, Mohammad is passionate about growing Syncrow into a multinational company.
data.TeamSecdescri7: The Yin to Talal’s Yang, Mohammad manages the operational aspects of Syncrow’s automation solution.
data.TeamSecdescri8: In addition to being the Chief Operating Officer at Syncrow, Mohammad is an excellent chef, with a particular affinity for Arabic cuisine. A loving husband and father, he enjoys spending time with family and friends when he is not working and is also passionate about singing. Mohammad eats, sleeps and breathes Syncrow, so you will often find him researching how to improve his work and discovering new horizons.

Seo.title: Smart Home Solutions in Dubai, UAE | Syncrow AE |
Seo.description: Connect all your functional needs to a network with Syncrow Smart Home Automation Solutions. Begin a smarter home lifestyle with Syncrow. Speak to our Expert Today.
